resources.string: Figures in stable rules interact rarely. You might need to plot a larger blob, or connect multiple blobs to see them develop.

For best results, start with an empty field, and plot some living cells before starting the simulation. For some rules, you might need to plot a larger blob, or connect multiple blobs to see them develop.

For best results, start with an empty field, and plot only one or two living cells before starting the simulation. Some rules (like Memory) work best with a simple shape or letter as a starting pattern.
For best results, use the random generator to initialize the simulation. You might need to interact with the field, or otherwise there might not be more interactions after some time.
